Harmful use of alcohol, defined according to the national context as alcohol per capita consumption (aged 15 years and older) within a calendar year in litres of pure alcohol
STAT_CONC_DEF:
Indicator available

Alcohol consumption: Current and Heavy Drinkers among Survey Total Population by background characteristics

Definition

Consumption in the past 30 days is defined as current alcohol drinkers. The quantity of alcohol consumed was assessed and drinkers were categorized into heavy and non -heavy drinkers.

Male heavy drinkers consumed more than 5 servings on a single occasion while for female it is 4 servings on a single occasion.
DATA_COMP:
It is computed as;

Heavy alcohol drinker =

Number of heavy drinkers / Total population x 100
